com.crawljax.core

Class CandidateElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.core.CandidateElement

  • public class CandidateElement
extends Object
    Candidate element for crawling. It is possible to link this eventable to form inputs, so that crawljax knows which values to set for this elements before it is clicked.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Danny Roest (dannyroest@gmail.com)
